extension.dc:title: Trait descriptor (v20140515)
extension.dc:description: The Germplasm Vocabulary (Darwin Core extension for genebanks) was developed in 2009 for sharing genebank datasets using the GBIF Integrated Publishing Toolkit (IPT) from the Global Biodiversity Information Facility (GBIF). This application schema describes the trait descriptors and methodology used for collecting trait measurements for the so-called Characterization and Evaluation (C and E) data. These terms where in part developed by the EPGRIS3 group of the European Cooperative Programme for Plant Genetic Resources (ECPGR) in 2009.
extension.name: MeasurementTrait

property.name: measurementTraitID
property.dc:description: Persistent identifier for a trait descriptor used to identify the description of the measurement method. This could be the persistent URL to an external ontology where the trait term is declared.

property.name: measurementTraitIdentifier
property.dc:description: Local identifier for a trait descriptor used to identify the description of the measurement method. This could be the persistent URL to an external ontology where the trait term is declared.

property.name: measurementTraitName
property.dc:description: English name used to identify the trait measurement method.
property.examples: stem rust susceptibility; powdery mildew susceptibility; plant height; ear density

property.name: measurementTraitCategory
property.dc:description: Classification type for the trait descriptor.
property.examples: agrobotanical; morphological; chemical; phenological; molecular biology; disease susceptibility/-resistance; tolerance (abiotic); utilization

property.name: measurementTraitScale
property.dc:description: Measurement scale used to score the measurement values.
property.examples: absolute; interval; nominal; ordinal; ratio; relative

property.name: measurementTraitSource
property.dc:description: Reference to a standard Germplasm Descriptor. For example the UPOV descriptor or the Bioversity Crop Descriptor identifier.

property.name: measurementTraitRemarks
property.dc:description: Remarks related to the trait measurement method.
property.examples: inflorescences after cutting; measured three days after heading date

property.name: measurementType
property.dc:description: The nature of the measurement, fact, characteristic, or assertion. Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary.
property.examples: tail length, temperature, trap line length, survey area, trap type

property.name: measurementMethod
property.dc:description: A description of or reference to (publication, URI) the method or protocol used to determine the measurement, fact, characteristic, or assertion.
property.examples: minimum convex polygon around burrow entrances (for a home range area), barometric altimeter
